Package dkeep.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class where is stored the current Map and the current type of level. Used to call the function responsible for updating each type of level, to change the level when asked by the LevelLogic, and to return the updated Map to the classes that print it.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Constructor used to build a game with the test map or with the default map
